name.namePart: Middle Eastern & North African Music Ensemble

mods.note: This audiovisual content is being provided solely for educational use and research, pursuant to exceptions in the Canadian Copyright Act. Further reproduction or distribution or other use may require additional permissions
mods.tableOfContents: West African Music Ensemble (featuring Ghanaian guitar master Koo Nimo) -- Atsiagbekor/gbekor -- Gahu/agahu -- Gota -- Indian Music Ensemble: Music from the Divine -- A series of Devotional Songs: Ganesh Vandana; Ram Bhajan; Hari Bhajan -- Tabla and Sitar Recital: Raag Bhupali; Tintal (performed by the Sitar and Tabla Students) -- Qawwali (performed by the Voice Students) / Amir Khusro -- Middle Eastern and North African Music Ensemble -- Fika kulla ma ara hasan (Arab mashriq)(featuring Jenny Boutros) / traditional Muwashshah -- Habbaytak (Lebanese)(featuring Rana El Kadi and Reem Skeik) / Ziad Rahbani; Lyrics by Joseph Hard -- Al Ghourba (Nubian Egyptian) / Ali Hassan Kuban -- Bote chin (Iranian)(featuring Kioumars Poorhaydari) / Ali-Akbar Shayda -- Da Magri (featuring Hoshyar Waissi) / traditional Kurdish -- Habibi Dyali (featuring Samira ElAtia) / traditional Moroccan -- Ya Mal al-Sham (featuring Tony Abinader) / traditional Syrian
